enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve clearing entries from the map, making them suitable for setting up a consistent state before testing clear().
This method also involves removing entries based on expiration, which can be used to set up a specific state before testing clear().
Calling removeAllExpired() before clear() ensures that all expired entries are removed, which can affect the state of the map before clearing.
Adding entries to the map before calling clear() can help verify that the clear() method correctly removes all entries, including those added just before the clear operation.
